titles: The two charters granted by King Charles IId to the proprietors of Carolina with the first and last fundamental constitutions of that colony.
author: England and Wales. Sovereign (1660-1685 : Charles II)

publisher: Printed and are to be sold by Richard Parker ...,
notes: Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
